attributes.title: Worry is Only An Illusion | Parashakti Akashic Series | 18 May 2022
அகமே உலகின் அளவி
attributes.description: Tamil Nithya Satsang recorded on the auspicious day of Karthigai Deepam (2nd December, 2017)

attributes.title: Mahasadashivoham - Introduction to Superconscious Breakthrough
attributes.description: In this video (17 December, 2017), Paramahamsa Nithyananda introduces Mahasadashivoham to the world. The essence of the introduction to Mahasadashivoham - You Made It!

attributes.title: ஒரு  ஜீவன் அடைய விரும்புவதும் அடையப்பட வேண்டியதும் என்ன?
Circuitry for Power Manifestation - Scientific Secrets Revealed
attributes.description: In this video (27 February, 2018), Paramahamsa Nithyananda speaks on how every thought current we cherish creates a certain map or circuit in our brain which either manifests as powers or powerlessness.

attributes.title: Mechanics of Sleeping & Waking States - Why You Feel Lethargic After Waking Up
attributes.description: In this video (6 March, 2018), Paramahamsa explains the mechanics of how we sleep, and wake up in relation to our states of consciousness. This is why we sometimes feel lethargic when we wake up.

attributes.title: Message of Sri Ram Chandra - Build Your Life on Powerful Cognitions
attributes.description: On the auspicious occasion of Ram Navami (25 March, 2018), Paramahamsa Nithyananda expands on the greatness of Avatar Sri Ram and His Tyaga for the sake of Dharma. Even when His kingdom was taken away, He did not lose His kinghood, because it was built on powerful cognitions. The message of Sri Ram's life in one line is: 'Build Your Life on Powerful Cognitions'

attributes.title: Walking Bare-feet on the Ground to Experience a Miracle of Mother Earth
attributes.description: In this video (8 April 2018), Paramahamsa Nithyananda reveals a mind boggling phenomenon that mother earth exhibits. How walking bare-feet on the ground can lead you to experience this miracle.

attributes.title: Laws of Karma Explained - What is Good Karma & Bad Karma
attributes.description: In this video (8 April 2018), Paramahamsa Nithyananda explains the laws of Karma - Cosmos does not record the quantity, but the quality of the experience produced as Karma. Paramahamsa Nithyananda differentiates between good karma and bad karma, and also explains the effects of eating non-vegetarian food.

attributes.title: Insights on E = mc² - Intensity is Continuity
attributes.description:
Insights on E = mc² - Intensity is Continuity For a Vegertarian

Paramhamsa Nithyananda debunks theory of major scientists by reflecting into the capability of the brain & very clearly defines how a non vegetarian diet consuming person's brain is different from that of a vegetarian person's brain and how it leads to the non-grasping ability of non-vegetarian person. A vegetarian can perceive why intensity can be continuous and how that person can create and charge a dry battery which doesn't lose intensity and can function forever without being charged.





----
Music: Simon Wilkinson - Royalty Free Ambient Space Music (promo video) For Documentary & Film
Link: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zk3Y28-fGJc
----

attributes.title: Shodasi Mantra - 16 Source Sounds to Manifest Enlightenment & Supernatural Powers
attributes.description: In this video (19-20 December 2014), Paramahamsa Nithyananda reveals the very esoteric and sacred Shodasi Mantra - which is a combination of 16 sacred syllables which can be used to manifest supernatural powers and ultimately enlightenment itself.
